entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: SSE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
